name: ChangBERT Portable Induction Cooktop Enhanced Version, One-Click Max Power 1800W Large Heating Coil Burner, Precise Temperature Control, NSF Certified Commercial Grade Low Noise Hot Plate
short_description: HIGH EFFICIENTY AND NO HOT KITCHEN - ChangBERT induction cooktop offers 9 preset power levels (200-1800W) and 18 preset temperature settings (120-460℉). transfers energy directly to magnetic cookware, heating the cookware itself rather than the surface for up to 83% energy efficiency. This direct heating method is more efficient than traditional gas or electric stoves, delivering instant response and stable performance, providing quick heat-up under high-demand kitchen environments.

CONSISTENTLY STABLE HIGH-POWER WITH ONE-CLICK MAX 1800W POWER BUTTON - This induction burner built for constant use, it features continuous-duty circuitry for non-stop cooking, including an upgraded control board with dual IGBT. The unique power control technology with one-click max power button ensures fast and stable high-power output, reduces the temperature of internal electronics, and facilitates low-noise heat dissipation. This dependable performance sets it apart from others.

LARGE COOKING AREA WITH 8-INCH HEATING COIL ENSURES PRECISE TEMPERATURE CONTROL FOR EVEN COOKING - Features an expanded 8” magnetic coil design that optimizes the winding structure to enhance the transfer of electromagnetic energy directly to the cookware, improving heating efficiency and ensuring more even heat distribution across the bottom of the cookware. This precise temperature control maintains steady heat to handling large cookwares for both professional kitchens and daily cooking.

NSF CERTIFIED & COMMERCIAL GRADE DURABILITY - UL commercial standard 197, completely ETL & NSF approved. It meets industry durability standards, passing a drop test with an impact of 1.5 ft lbs. This cooker designed for large-volume usage, it is ideal for commercial and professional settings such as restaurants, hotel buffets, food trucks, institutional kitchens and catering services, while also perfect for large-volume usage.

ENHANCED VERSION FOR BETTER PROFESSIONAL & CONVENIENT COOKING EXPERIENCE - Enhanced version equipped dedicated one-click buttons allow instant access to key functions, reducing steps during busy cooking. The extended 12-hour timer supports long simmering and unattended cooking with confidence. A large dual digital display clearly shows power or temperature and timer at the same time, easy to read in all lighting conditions and angles. Every upgrade delivers smoother operation for daily cooking.

EASE OF USE - The physical control buttons with solid tactile response make operation intuitive and precise, reducing accidental touches during cooking, even with gloves or wet hands. With simple and clear display, the Key-Press-Control Panel provides clear visibility and easy to learn with no training needed. BOIL and KEEP WARM buttons let you jump straight to max power for boiling water or switch to steady holding without adjustments, perfect for fast heating and keeping food ready to serve.

EASY TO CLEAN - Perfect for frequent, everyday use, this hot plate features a stainless steel construction and a full-glass surface that wipes clean in seconds and stays looking new over time. The fully sealed control panel keeps spills from getting inside, while the sleek, flush design means no hidden corners to scrub. Compared to traditional stoves, infrared burners, cleanup is quicker and easier, spend less time cleaning and more time enjoying your meals.

STAINLESS STEEL STURDY CONSTRUCTION SUPPORTS UP TO 100 LBS - Made of premium stainless steel, this cooktop is built for long-lasting durability. The heavy-duty metal construction withstands high heat, humidity, and daily use without melting, cracking over time, delivering far greater stability than plastic housings when used with large or heavy cookware. Combined with a shatter-proof glass surface, both materials are easy to clean and looking new through frequent home and professional use.

PORTABLE & COMPACT FOR EASY COOKING ANYWHERE - Engineered with high-quality materials and designed for effortless portability, this electric burner’s compact design saves valuable counter space and is convenient for storage. For home use, it’s perfect in home kitchens, dorms, apartments. For outdoor cooking, take it to RV trips, campsites, backyards, camping, cabins, boat, etc. and pair it with a portable power station delivering fast, even heating even with limited power.

MULTIPLE SAFETY PROTECTIONS WITH 2 YEARS WARRANTY & SERVICE - Equipped with built-in auto-pan detection, over-heat protection, hot surface indication, small article detection, auto shutdown protection, and circuit failure protection. With no hot coils or open flames, it significantly reduces the risk of burns. 2-year limited warranty for home use and 1-year limited warranty for commercial use, with dedicated technical support. Contact us by email for more details.

short_description: MAKE ADJUSTMENTS ON-THE-FLY – Want hotter temperature or need to cook it longer? No problem. Simply adjust on-the-fly any time. No need to start over. Flex’s intuitive digital controls are easy to operate, and the response is immediate.

45 PRE-PROGRAMMED TEMPS - Select from the 6 convenient preset temperature settings or fine tune your own temperature from 100°F to 500°F in 10°F increments. You can also add or deduct cooking time at any time.
PRECISE TEMPERATURE CONTROL – With 45 precise temperatures at your fingertips, you can keep delicate sauces warm at 100°F to grilling a juicy steak with serious grill marks at 500°F.

SHATTER-PROOF CERAMIC GLASS – The heating surface is heavy-duty shatter-proof ceramic glass. It was rigorously tested to withstand intense heat without shattering. It is one of the safest cooktops on the market.

SUPERIOR TECHNOLOGY - The slim design of Flex and its patented insulation technology brings the induction heating coils closer to your cookware than the competition for faster & even heating, ensuring no hot or cold spots for optimal cooking experience.

name: AMZCHEF Double Induction Cooktop with Removable Griddle Pan Non-stick, 1800W 2 burner Portable Induction Stove With Sensor Touch 9 Power Levels, 99 Min Timer, Iron Grey
short_description: [2-in-1 Induction Cooktop and Griddle] This portable induction cooktop features 2 burners and a removable griddle pan. It can be used as a replacement for electric indoor grills or as a double induction burner. The removable griddle pan makes cooking versatile, allowing you to cook anything from delicate pancakes to sizzling steaks, spaghetti, bacon, scrambled eggs, and more.

[2 COOKING ZONES] With a 120V/1100W (left plate) and 1100W (right plate) power supply, this portable stove has two separate cooking zones with individual controls using a "Knob + Touch" control design. When both burners are working simultaneously, the maximum power will not exceed 1800W in total.

[Removable Non-stick Griddle] The induction cooktop 2 burner features a convenient removable griddle pan with rubber handles, which is suitable for various cooking needs. The grill pan provides excellent heat retention and distribution, allowing you to barbecue while keeping food warm without worrying about burning or excessive smoke, creating a healthier dining environment.

[Easy To Clean] The induction burner surface is made of black polished crystal glass, which is shiny and resistant. Simply wipe it with a damp towel. The grill pan surface is covered with a non-toxic, non-stick coating that leaves no frying residue and is dishwasher safe.

[Only for Magnetic Pots and Pans] This induction hot plate is compatible with magnetic induction cookware such as cast iron, iron, steel, and enameled iron cookware with a diameter between 4.72 inches and 9.44 inches. You can use a small magnet to test whether the cookware is compatible. This induction cooktop features cookware detection. If no suitable cookware or no cookware is placed, it will display "E0" to prompt you to use compatible cookware.

short_description: PRECISE TIME & TEMPERATURE CONTROL: Enjoy perfect cooking results with 10 adjustable power levels—from 600W (140°F) up to 1500W (465°F)—and a 1-minute to 3-hour timer. Easily select the ideal heat and time for simmering, sautéing, boiling, or frying with precision every time.

FAST HEATING & ENERGY EFFICIENT: Experience faster cooking with induction technology that transfers over 85% of its electromagnetic energy directly to your cookware. This means quicker heating, even cooking, and less wasted energy—no hot or cold spots!

product_description: The Elite Gourmet EIND57BL Digital Induction Cooktop brings precision, safety, and efficiency to your kitchen in a sleek, modern design. With 10 adjustable power levels ranging from 600 to 1500 watts and temperatures from 140°F to 465°F, you can simmer sauces, sear meats, or boil water with perfect control. The soft touch controls make it easy to adjust heat or set the 1-minute to 3-hour timer for hassle-free, hands-free cooking. Crafted with a durable, shatter-proof ceramic glass top, this induction cooktop is both stylish and built to last—resistant to heat and easy to clean after every use. Its slim design offers a low profile for stability, compact storage, and ease of use, while the energy-efficient technology transfers over 85% of its power directly to your cookware, ensuring fast, even heating without wasting electricity or creating hot spots. Whether in a home kitchen, dorm room, office, RV, or outdoor setup, the EIND57BL Digital Induction Cooktop delivers consistent performance and reliability. Safety and convenience are at the heart of the Elite Gourmet design. The child safety lock, auto-pan detection, overheat protection, and automatic shut-off provide peace of mind while cooking. Backed by over 40 years of trusted quality, Elite Gourmet supports every product with a 1-year warranty and responsive, U.S.-based customer care—ready to help by phone, email, or chat whenever you need assistance.

short_description: MAKE ADJUSTMENTS ON-THE-FLY – Want hotter temperature or need to cook it longer? No problem. Simply adjust on-the-fly any time. No need to start over. Pro Chef’s intuitive digital controls are easy to operate, and the response is immediate.

94 PRE-PROGRAMMED TEMPS - Select from the 6 convenient preset temperature settings or fine tune your own temperature from 100°F to 575°F in 5°F increments. You can also add or deduct cooking time at any time.
